snippet: The radical art collective Voina says members set a police vehicle on fire in St. Petersburg on New Year’s Eve as “a gift to all political prisoners of Russia.”
abstract: Russian radical art collective Voina says members set a police vehicle on fire in St Petersburg on New Year’s Eve as 'a gift to all political prisoners of Russia.'
lead_paragraph: The radical art collective Voina says members set a police vehicle on fire in St. Petersburg on New Year’s Eve as “a gift to all political prisoners of Russia.”

headline.seo: Russian Art Group, Voina, Claims Attack on Police Van
headline.main: Russian Art Group Claims Attack on Police Van
headline.print_headline: Russia: Artists’ Group Claims That It Burned a Police Vehicle
